meanings.definition: The state or quality of being extremely cold.
meanings.sent1: The gelidness of the ice made me shiver.
meanings.sent2: I could feel the gelidness of the snow on my skin.
meanings.sent3: Despite the gelidness, the penguins seemed perfectly content.
meanings.sent4: The gelidness of her stare sent a chill down my spine.
meanings.sent5: The gelidness of the winter wind was bone-chilling.

meanings.sent1: The gelidness in the room was unbearable.
meanings.sent2: She wrapped herself in a blanket to ward off the gelidness.
meanings.sent3: The gelidness of the ice cream gave me brain freeze.
meanings.sent4: His words had a gelidness that made me feel isolated.
meanings.sent5: The gelidness of the water numbed my fingers instantly.
